00040 #ifndef __CVMX_APP_CONFIG_H__
00041 #define __CVMX_APP_CONFIG_H__
00042 
00043 #ifdef    __cplusplus
00044 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00045 extern "C" {
00046 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00047 #endif
00048 
00049 /* This defines the name of the named block from which config(pko, pools)
00050    is exported/imported */
00051 #define CVMX_APP_CONFIG "cvmx-app-config"
00052 
00053 /* skip_app_config */
00054 extern int skip_app_config;
00055 
00056 /**
00057  * Sets the skip_app_config. This can be called by the application when
00058  * it wants to skip the configuration.
00059  */
00060 void cvmx_skip_app_config_set(void);
00061 
00062 /**
00063  * @INTERNAL
00064  * Called by apps to export app config to other
00065  * cooperating applications using a named block
00066  * defined by param block_name.
00067  *
00068  * @param block_name Name of the named block to use for exporting config.
00069  *
00070  * @return 0 on success.
00071  */
00072 int __cvmx_export_app_config_to_named_block(char * block_name);
00073 
00074 /**
00075  * @INTERNAL
00076  * Called by apps to import app config from other
00077  * cooperating applications using a named block
00078  * defined by param block_name.
00079  *
00080  * @param block_name Name of the named block to use for exporting config.
00081  *
00082  * @return 0 on success.
00083  */
00084 int __cvmx_import_app_config_from_named_block(char * block_name);
00085 
00086 /**
00087  * @INTERNAL
00088  * Called by apps to clean app config named block.
00089  */
00090 void __cvmx_export_app_config_cleanup(void);
00091 
00092 int __cvmx_export_config(void);
00093 
00094 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00095 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00096 }
00097 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00098 #endif
00099 
00100 #endif /* __CVMX_APP_CONFIG_H__ */
